name: Animal Karma: Mystery Island
description:
A cruise ship crashes at a reef near a mysterious island and every human aboard turns into an animal! Help the friends to build a city, pass all trials and become humans once again.

Build a city of your dream in a friendly company of animals, develop farms and grow harvest, cook sushi, pies, soups and fish to trade with the nearby islands. You'll be constructing many buildings and developing both production and entertainment areas for the island dwellers.
Multiple entertaining task and puzzles, events and festivals are waiting for you.

Solve the riddles of the mysterious tropical island along with your family and kids, complete the game and help the animals to become humans once again!

Develop your city, construct various buildings and decorations
Grow crops at farms and cook the delicious meals
Negotiate and trade with the nearby islands
Communicate with your island's inhabitans and complete their tasks
Solve the island's riddle and return the human form to the animals
Play with your family and children
